content: No matter how much you try to convince people that chocolate is vanilla, it'll still be chocolate, even though you may manage to convince yourself and a few others that it's vanilla.
translations: ita:Non importa quanto si cerchi di convincere la gente che la cioccolata è vaniglia, sarà comunque cioccolata, anche se si
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CK (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
